SELECT t.city_name as cityname, t.storeId as platformid, t.storeName as storename, t.employeeName as employeename, t.cusId as cusid, t.orderSn as ordersn, IFNULL(SUM(IF(t._type=1,t._count,0)),0) AS dashang FROM ( select _tor.city_name, _tor.storeId, _tor.storeName, _tor.employeeId, _tor.employeeName, _tor.cusId, _tor.orderSn, COUNT(trp.id) AS _count, 1 AS _type from t_order_receipts trp JOIN (select ts.id storeId, ts.name storeName, a.`name` AS city_name, tem.id employeeId, tem.`name` employeeName, tcs.id cusId, tor.order_sn orderSn, tor.group_id from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_customer tcs on tcs.id=tor.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tof.order_status='signed' and tep.name not like '%测试%' and ts.name not like '%测试%' and EXISTS (select 1 from t_store where id=tor.store_id and number IN (${storeids})) GROUP BY tor.group_id) _tor on _tor.group_id=trp.order_group_id where trp.type='employee' and trp.price!=0 and trp.pay_status='payed' GROUP BY _tor.employeeId,_tor.orderSn,_tor.storeId ) t GROUP BY t.storeId, t.employeeId, t.orderSn
LIMIT ${limitcond}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(dashang),0) AS dashangsum,count(*) AS totalcount FROM ( SELECT t.city_name as cityname, t.storeId as platformid, t.storeName as storename, t.employeeName as employeename, t.cusId as cusid, t.orderSn as ordersn, IFNULL(SUM(IF(t._type=1,t._count,0)),0) AS dashang FROM ( select _tor.city_name, _tor.storeId, _tor.storeName, _tor.employeeId, _tor.employeeName, _tor.cusId, _tor.orderSn, COUNT(trp.id) AS _count, 1 AS _type from t_order_receipts trp JOIN (select ts.id storeId, ts.name storeName, a.`name` AS city_name, tem.id employeeId, tem.`name` employeeName, tcs.id cusId, tor.order_sn orderSn, tor.group_id from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_customer tcs on tcs.id=tor.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tof.order_status='signed' and tep.name not like '%测试%' and ts.name not like '%测试%' and EXISTS (select 1 from t_store where id=tor.store_id and number IN (${storeids})) GROUP BY tor.group_id) _tor on _tor.group_id=trp.order_group_id where trp.type='employee' and trp.price!=0 and trp.pay_status='payed' GROUP BY _tor.employeeId,_tor.orderSn,_tor.storeId ) t GROUP BY t.storeId, t.employeeId, t.orderSn ) rewardline
